mapper.select: select qnaNo, qnaId, qnaTitle, qnaTime, qnaAnswer from qna order by qnaNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qnaId, qnaTitle, qnaContent, qnaTime) values(#{qnaId},#{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent},#{qnaTime})
mapper.update: update qna set qnaAnswer=#{qnaAnswer} where qnaNo=#{qnaNo}
update qna set qnaAnswer=null where qnaNo=#{qnaNo}
